brainly_data.question:
People buy more electric cars to stop pollution. Auto mechanics jobs will be? 

A. Moved to somewhere else
B. Done differently
C. Both of these
D. None of these
brainly_data.subject: Business

all_answers.question:

all_answers.subject: Business
all_answers.text: B still mechanics just ones with the electrical knowledge of cars which will cost alot more resulting in better pay.
